article: the police raided a factory mass-producing videotapes portraying a leftist party 's candidate for mexico city mayor as a violent ideologue , and his aides asserted thursday that the tapes were part of a dirty tricks campaign to hurt the party in national elections .
abstract: mexico cracks down on dirty politics
